amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibt the use of funds in H.R. 1 to be used to enforce section 75.708 of title 34, Code of Federal Regulations, as it relates to section 5205 of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 7221d).

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Polis amendment was withdrawn.
